It doesn't include its own @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.q2TYVAMaK6UfenbV]{Lock}, but it has a fastener to which a Lock can be applied.

The interior contains three cots, one chamber pot, and a small fireplace holding a magical fire. The interior is lit with a small magical light that you can light or extinguish at will using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. The climate inside the hut is comfortable and allows creatures inside it to withstand most hostile weather conditions, but incredible heat or cold, powerful storms, and winds of hurricane force or greater destroy the hut. Other creatures can freely enter and exit the hut without damaging it, but if you exit the hut, the spell ends. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell.

Crashing Wave.name: Crashing Wave
Crashing Wave.description:
You summon a crashing wave that sweeps away from you. You deal 6d6 bludgeoning damage to creatures in the area. The water also extinguishes non-magical fires in the area.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Create Demiplane.name: Create Demiplane
Create Demiplane.description:
Few incantations are as renowned as the power to create worlds. To cast this ritual, you must be on the Astral Plane, the Ethereal Plane, or a plane that connects to one of the two.

A demiplane created with this ritual exists on the Astral or Ethereal Plane. It can have the appearance of any mundane environment or structure, such as a glorious cathedral, a clearing in a forest, a comfortably furnished cavern, or anything else one can imagine. All demiplanes have finite, unbreachable boundaries, which might resemble stone, wood, or something more unnatural, such as a wall of mist or unceasing void.

Demiplanes have environmental conditions as appropriate for the Material Plane, though the primary caster can dictate a general climate or light level, as well as whether the demiplane experiences seasons or a day-night cycle. The demiplane has no native plants or animals, but they can be introduced, and plants will grow in a demiplane's light.

When you first cast create demiplane, the casters are teleported to the demiplane. The demiplane has no direct access to other worlds, so @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift} or similar abilities are necessary to access it. As part of casting the ritual to create a new demiplane, you create a key to the demiplane which serves as a plane shift tuning fork for that demiplane. Most resemble ornate keys, but some take the forms of maps, compasses, or dowsing rods.

If you have the original key to an existing demiplane and are on that demiplane, you can instead use this ritual to either expand the demiplane or add special traits or features.

  • Alignment The demiplane gains one alignment trait, such as lawful or good.
  • Bounteous The demiplane has a functional ecosystem, with plants and animals appropriate to the environment. This ecosystem doesn't require any additional effort on your part to maintain.
  • Elemental The demiplane gains the air, earth, fire, or water planar essence trait.
  • Gravity The demiplane gains a gravity trait of your choice.
  • Key You create an additional key that can be used to access the demiplane with plane shift and improve it with create demiplane.
  • Portal You create a permanent gateway between the demiplane and a single other location. You must spend the ritual's casting time constructing the gateway on the external side, which typically resembles an arch or doorway of some sort. The gate is always active, but it can be secured as you would any door.
  • Scope The demiplane can be unbounded instead of finite, though still with the same size.

Critical Success You create a new demiplane whose area consists of two contiguous squares, each 100 feet on a side. The ceiling is 20 feet high. If modifying an existing demiplane, you can instead either add this area to the demiplane's size or add two special traits or features.

Success As critical success, but the demiplane's area is a single square, 100 feet on a side and a ceiling 20 feet high. If modifying an existing demiplane, you can add one special trait or feature.

Failure The ritual has no effect.

Critical Failure Something goes horribly wrong, and all casters are teleported to an unknown but likely hostile plane.

Heightened (10th) The ritual creates a square area 1,000 feet on a side, with a ceiling 20 feet high (two contiguous areas of this size on a critical success). The cost of the ritual increases to 20,000 gp

Create Food.name: 造粮术 Create Food
Create Food.description:
你创造了足够六个中型（Medium）生物食用一天的食物。这些食物味道平淡令人乏味，但足够营养。在1天后，如果没有人食用这些食物，它会腐坏并且无法使用。大部分小型（Small）生物食用如同中型（Medium）生物1/4的食物（对于超小型（Tiny）生物而言为1/6)，大部分大型（Large）生物食用10倍的食物（对于超大型（Huge）生物而言为100倍，以此类推）。

升阶 (4环级) 你可以供给12个中型生物。

升阶 (6环级) 你可以供给50个中型生物。

升阶 (8环级) 你可以供给200个中型生物。

Create Skinstitch.name: Create Skinstitch
Create Skinstitch.description:
You transform the target into a skinstitch, a hideous construct covered in the flesh of sentient humanoids.

Critical Success The target becomes a skinstitch. If it's at least 4 levels lower than you, you can make it a minion which gives it the minion trait. You can have a maximum of four minions under your control. If it doesn't become a minion, you can give it one simple command that it pursues single-mindedly. If you aren't a follower of @Compendium[pf2e.deities.GX6PF9ifR47Xyjg9]{Norgorber}, it ignores any of your subsequent commands. A follower of Norgorber can give the skinstitch simple commands by presenting a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.upzjwQ96cZG0Xlmx]{Religious Symbol} of the deity and commanding it with a single action that has the auditory and concentrate traits.

Success As critical success, except a skinstitch that doesn't become your minion stays in place and attacks anyone that attacks or tries to move it, rather than following your command.

Failure You fail to create the skinstitch.

Critical Failure You create the skinstitch, but it goes berserk and attempts to kill you, ignoring your commands even if you are a follower of Norgorber.

Create Undead.name: Create Undead
Create Undead.description:
You transform the target into an undead creature with a level up to that allowed in Table 7-1. There are many versions of this ritual, each specific to a particular type of undead (one ritual for all zombies, one for skeletons, one for ghouls, and so on), and the rituals that create rare undead are also rare. Some forms of undead, such as liches, form using their own unique methods and can't be created with a version of create undead.

Table 7-1: Creatures Creation Rituals

Creature Level Spell Level Required Cost
-1 or 0 2 15 gp
1 2 60 gp
2 3 105 gp
3 3 180 gp
4 4 300 gp
5 4 480 gp
6 5 750 gp
7 5 1,080 gp
8 6 1,500 gp
9 6 2,100 gp
10 7 3,000 gp
11 7 4,200 gp
12 8 6,000 gp
13 8 9,000 gp
14 9 13,500 gp
15 9 19,500 gp
16 10 30,000 gp
17 10 45,000 gp

Critical Success The target becomes an undead creature of the appropriate type. If it's at least 4 levels lower than you, you can make it a minion. This gives it the minion trait, meaning it can use 2 actions when you command it, and commanding it is a single action that has the auditory and concentrate traits. You can have a maximum of four minions under your control. If it's intelligent and doesn't become a minion, the undead is helpful to you for awakening it, though it's still a horrid and evil creature. If it's unintelligent and doesn't become a minion, you can give it one simple command. It pursues that goal single-mindedly, ignoring any of your subsequent commands.

Success As critical success, except an intelligent undead that doesn't become your minion is only friendly to you, and an unintelligent undead that doesn't become your minion leaves you alone unless you attack it. It marauds the local area rather than following your command.

Failure You fail to create the undead.

Critical Failure You create the undead, but its soul, tortured by your foul necromancy, is full of nothing but hatred for you. It attempts to destroy you.

Create Water.name: 造水术 Create Water
Create Water.description: 你将手捧起，水从中涌出。你创造2加仑的水。如果没有人饮用它，水会在1天后蒸发。

Creation.name: 造物术 Creation
Creation.description:
你使用神秘能量创造一个临时的物体。它必须由植物材料（例如木头或者纸）组成，并且为5立方尺或更小。该物体不能需求复杂的工艺，或者复杂的活动机构，并且无法作为消耗或者类似的作用，并且不能由昂贵材料，或者稀有度在罕见以上的材料组成。它显然是临时创造的，因此无法被卖出或者确实的礼物。

升阶 (5环级) 该物品是金属制，并且可以包括常见矿物，例如长石或者水晶。

Crisis of Faith.name: 信念崩塌 Crisis of Faith
Crisis of Faith.description:
你攻击目标的信仰，搅动该生物的疑虑和心智中的混乱，造成6d6心灵伤害，如果目标能施放神术法术，造成6d8伤害。法术效果由意志豁免决定。

对于大多数神祇，没有明确的理由对你自己神祇的信徒施放该法术是一项禁忌。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标承受一半伤害。

失败 目标承受完整伤害；如果目标能释放神术法术，它会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} 持续1轮。

大失败 目标承受双倍伤害， @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} 持续1轮，并且无法施放神术法术，持续1轮。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6（或者如果目标时神术施法者时为2d8）。

Crusade.name: 圣战 Crusade
Crusade.description:
你向目标施加一个神圣使命。你声明一项使命。这可以是获得一件物品，占有一片土地，杀死一个生物，和一个团体开战，或者保持和平。你的使命不能强迫目标互相伤害或者伤害自身。目标会完全投入该使命，根据其等级。它们选择各自的行动，但是它们会倾向直接的行动，而不是不作为或者间接的行动。

  • 13级或更低 目标投入该使命，并追随该使命直到死亡（除非你另外指明终止条件）。
  • 14级 目标投入使命，但是在目标生命值减少到其最大生命值一半或者更少时结束。
  • 15级 如14级，以及目标可以在其每个回合的结束尝试一次意志豁免来结束自身上的该法术效果。

如果你或者你的盟友对目标作出敌对动作，或者使命得到完成，法术会对所有目标生物结束。GM可以决定法术具有对应该使命的阵营特征。

升阶 (10环级) 每个类别的等级提升2。

Crushing Despair.name: 极度绝望 Crushing Despair
Crushing Despair.description:
你令区域内的生物极其绝望。对于每个生物的效果基于其意志豁免。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 在1轮中，目标不能进行反应动作，并且必须在其回合开始尝试另一次豁免，否则会由于难以控制的悲痛获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

失败 如同成功，但缓慢（slowed）持续1分钟。

大失败 如同失败，但自动获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} ，持续1分钟。

升阶 (7环级) 该区域增加到60尺锥形。

Crushing Ground.name: Crushing Ground
Crushing Ground.description:
You tear open the ground then slam it shut. The target creature takes 2d6 bludgeoning damage with a Reflex save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage.

Failure The target takes full damage, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, and takes a -10-foot circumstance penalty to Speed.

Critical Failure The target takes double damage and is flat-footed and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized}. It can attempt to Escape against your spell DC. If it doesn't Escape, the target takes an additional 2d6 bludgeoning damage when the spell ends.

Heightened (+1) Increase the initial damage and additional damage by 2d6.

Cry of Destruction.name: Cry of Destruction
Cry of Destruction.description:
Your voice booms, smashing what's in front of you. Each creature and unattended object in the area takes 1d8 sonic damage. If you already dealt damage to an enemy this turn with a Strike or spell, increase the damage dice from this spell to d12s.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d8.

Cup of Dust.name: Cup of Dust
Cup of Dust.description:
You curse the target with a thirst no drink can quench. You can Dismiss the spell. The target must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is immediately afflicted by thirst as if it hadn't had a drink in days. It becomes Fatigued and takes 1d4 damage each hour that can't be healed until it quenches its thirst. No amount of drinking can quench the creature's thirst during the spell's duration.

Critical Failure As failure but the creature takes 2d4 damage each hour, twice as much as usual for thirst.

Heightened (+3) The thirst becomes more unbearable, increasing the damage each hour by 1d4, or by 2d4 on a critical failure.

Curse Of Lost Time.name: Curse Of Lost Time
Curse Of Lost Time.description:
You mimic the process of aging or erosion on the target. The effect depends on whether the target is an object, a construct, or a living creature. Artifacts and objects and constructs made of precious materials, as determined by the GM, are immune.

• Object If the object is attended, its bearer can attempt a Fortitude save. If the bearer fails or the object is unattended, the object immediately takes [[/r 4d6]] damage (applying Hardness normally) and the item is cursed with an unlimited duration. Until the curse ends, the item becomes shoddy and can't be @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.bT3skovyLUtP22ME]{Repaired}, and the curse attempts to counteract any spell that would restore the object's Hit Points. @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OyFCwQuw8XRazsNr]{Remove Curse} can target an item affected by this spell.

• Construct The construct takes [[/r 4d6]] damage (basic Fortitude save). On a failure, for 1 hour the construct is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, and can't be Repaired, and the curse attempts to counteract any spell that would restore the construct's Hit Points. On a critical failure, these effects have an unlimited duration.

• Living Creature The living creature must attempt a Fortitude save. Ageless creatures are immune.

Critical Success The living creature is unaffected.

Success The living creature briefly ages, becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.

Failure As success, with a duration of 1 hour.

Critical Failure As success, with an unlimited duration.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by [[/r 1d6]].

Curse of Death.name: Curse of Death
Curse of Death.description:
You focus your malevolent gaze on a target, causing their heart to seize in dread. The target must attempt a Fortitude saving throw. Regardless of the result, the target is temporarily immune to further castings of curse of death for 1 day.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is afflicted with the curse of death at stage 1, and the stage of the curse can't increase beyond stage 1.

Failure The target is afflicted with the curse of death at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with the curse of death at stage 2

Curse of Death (curse) This curse ends immediately when the spell ends

Stage 1 [[/r {4d6}[negative]]]{4d6 negative damage} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} (1 round)

Stage 2 [[/r {8d6}[negative]]]{8d6 negative damage} and fatigued (1 round)

Stage 3 [[/r {12d6}[negative]]]{12d6 negative damage} and fatigued (1 round)

Stage 4 death

Heightened (+1) Increase the negative damage taken on a success and during the first three stages of the curse by [[/r {1d6}[negative]]].

Daemon Form.name: Daemon Form
Daemon Form.description:
You infuse yourself with the corrupting death and pure malevolence of Abaddon, transforming into a Large daemon battle form. You must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. When you cast this spell you choose either ceustodaemon, leukodaemon, meladaemon, or piscodaemon. The battle form is Medium if you choose ceustodaemon. While in this form, you gain the daemon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 21 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 15 temporary Hit Points and weakness 5 to good.
  • A +2 status bonus to all saving throws against death effects.
  • Resistance 10 to poison.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +21, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of Daemon you choose:

  • Ceustodaemon Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Any successful jaws or claw Strike deals an additional 1d6 damage, and you take the same amount of damage.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1n84AqLtsdT8I64W]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Ceustodaemon)}

  • Leukodaemon Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet; +2 status bonus to saves against diseases;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Ranged 1 composite longbow (deadly d10, range increment 100 feet, volley), Damage 2d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ScF0ECWnfXMHYLDL]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Leukodaemon)}

  • Meladaemon Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;
    • Melee1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 1d8 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 negative, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.zIRnnuj4lARq43DA]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Meladaemon)}

  • Piscodaemon Speed 25 feet, swim 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 claw, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 persistent bleed, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target;
    • Melee 1 tentacle (agile), Damage 2d6 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0W87OkYi3qCwNGSj]{Spell Effect: Daemon Form (Piscodaemon)}

Daemonic Pact.name: Daemonic Pact
Daemonic Pact.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a daemon. You call upon a daemon whose level can be no more than double daemonic pact's spell level, two daemons whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three daemons whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the daemon or daemons, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Success You conjure the daemon or daemons, who serve you willingly, but require a sacrifice in the form of spilled blood (either another creature's or your own).

Failure You don't conjure any daemons.

Critical Failure You don't conjure any daemons, and the self-sacrifice required to perform the ritual leaves you @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} if the spell level is 5 or higher).

Dance of Darkness.name: Dance of Darkness
Dance of Darkness.description:
You dance, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Striding} up to half your Speed. At either the start or end of your Stride, you create an area of magical darkness in a 10-foot burst centered on your location. This area is filled with magical darkness that works the same way as that created by a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4GE2ZdODgIQtg51c]{Darkness} spell of the same level. When you create the darkness, attempt a Performance check to dance, with a standard DC for your level, to determine the duration of the darkness.

Critical Success 1 minute

Success 2 rounds

Failure 1 round

Dancing Lights.name: 舞光术 Dancing Lights
Dancing Lights.description: 你创造最多四个悬浮的光源，任意两者之间距离不超过10尺。每个光源都会发出如同火炬的光亮。当你维持该法术时，你可以移动每个光源至多60尺。每个光源与你的距离必须在120尺内，并且和所有其他光源射程不超过10尺，否则会消失。

Darkened Eyes.name: Darkened Eyes
Darkened Eyes.description:
You infuse a creature's vision with darkness. After attempting its save, the target becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's darkvision or low-light vision is suppressed for 1 round.

Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute.

Critical Failure As success, but the duration is 1 minute, and the target is also @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for the duration. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns. If it succeeds, it's no longer Blinded, but its darkvision or low-light vision remains suppressed.

Darklight.name: Darklight
Darklight.description:
Shadows pour forth from your eyes, creating a field of darkness that prevents light from emanating within the area. Light doesn't enter the area; any non-magical light sources, such as a torches or lanterns, don't emanate any light while inside the area, even if their light radius would extend beyond the darkness. The spell similarly suppresses magical light of the spell's level or lower.

Light can't pass through, so creatures in the area can't see outside. Even creatures with darkvision (but not greater darkvision) can barely see through the darkness; any creatures seen through the darkness are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to them. Creatures with greater darkvision can see through the darkness normally.

Creatures who move into the field or start their turn within the field have some of the life and light sucked out of them, taking 2d6 bludgeoning damage and 2d6 negative damage, with a basic Fortitude save.

When you cast this spell, choose up to four allies in the area to spare from darklight's effects. Until the spell ends, they're immune to damage from darklight spells and can see through darklight (but not other darkness) as though they had greater darkvision.

Heightened (10th) The bludgeoning and negative damage both increase to 3d6.

Darkness.name: 黑暗术 Darkness
Darkness.description:
你创造一片黑暗的帷幕，光线无法穿透，并且光源无法在区域中发光。光线无法进入该区域，并且任何非魔法光源，例如火炬或者提灯，在区域中不会发出任何光线，即使其光照可能到达黑暗术之外也是如此。这也会压制等于或低于你的黑暗术环级的魔法光亮。光线无法穿透，所以在区域中的生物无法看到外面。对于外面，这看起来如同一团纯粹黑暗的球。

升阶 (4环级) 即使具有黑暗视觉的生物（但不包括高等黑暗视觉）也几乎无法看穿这黑暗。它们透过黑暗看到的生物视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。

Darkvision.name: 黑暗视觉 Darkvision
Darkvision.description:
你赋予自身在黑暗区域中超自然的视觉。你获得黑暗视觉。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.IXS15IQXYCZ8vsmX]{法术效果：黑暗视觉}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.inNfTmtWpsxeGBI9]{法术效果：黑暗视觉（24小时）}

升阶 (3环级) 该法术的射程为接触，目标为1个自愿生物。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的射程为接触，目标为1个自愿生物。法术持续时间为直到下次你进行的日常准备。

Day's Weight.name: Day's Weight
Day's Weight.description:
You fast-forward time for a single creature, burdening it with the aches and pain of an entire day and making it temporarily tired and weak. The creature must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 round.

Failure The target is fatigued and enfeebled 1 for the duration.

Critical Failure The target is fatigued and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} for the duration. The fatigued condition doesn't end when the spell's duration does (but can still be removed with a night's rest or by similar means).

Heightened (6th) You can target up to 10 creatures.

Daydreamer's Curse.name: Daydreamer's Curse
Daydreamer's Curse.description:
You impose a curse upon the target that renders it easily distracted and unable to focus its thoughts on tasks that demand insight or discernment. The target must attempt a Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 10 minutes, the target must roll twice and use the worse result whenever attempting a Medicine, Nature, Perception, or Survival check. If the target critically succeeds at a Perception check or skill check to perform an action with the concentrate trait, the target gets a success instead.

Failure As success, but the effect is permanent.

Critical Failure As failure, except the target treats the outcomes of all checks with the concentrate trait as one degree of success worse than the result it rolled (a critical success becomes a success, a success becomes a failure, and a failure becomes a critical failure).

Daze.name: 晕眩术 Daze
Daze.description:
你蒙蔽了目标的精神，利用精神冲击令目标晕眩。这股冲击造成等于你的施法属性调整值的心灵伤害；目标必须尝试一次基础意志豁免。如果目标在豁免中大失败，它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

升阶 (+2) 该伤害增加1d6。

Dazzling Flash.name: Dazzling Flash
Dazzling Flash.description:
You raise your religious symbol and create a blinding flash of light. Each creature in the area must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round and Dazzled for 1 minute. The creature can spend an Interact action rubbing its eyes to end the Blinded condition.

Critical Failure The creature is Blinded for 1 round and Dazzled for 1 hour.

Heightened (3rd) The area increases to a @Template[type:cone|distance:30].

Deafness.name: 耳聋术 Deafness
Deafness.description:
目标失去听觉；它必须尝试一次强韧豁免。之后目标会暂时免疫1分钟。

大失败 目标不受影响。

成功 目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} 1轮。

失败 目标耳聋10分钟。

大失败 目标永久耳聋。

Death Knell.name: 死亡丧钟 Death Knell
Death Knell.description:
你将处于死亡边缘的生物的生命力量吸出。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。如果这将其杀死，你获得10临时生命，以及在攻击和伤害骰上的+1状态加值，持续10分钟。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标的 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{濒死 Dying} 值增加1。

失败 目标死亡。

Death Ward.name: 防死结界 Death Ward
Death Ward.description:
你从负能量的侵袭中保护一个生物。

它在对抗死亡和负能量效果的豁免上获得+4状态加值，获得负能量抗力10，并且压制 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed} 状态的效果。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.s6CwkSsMDGfUmotn]{法术效果：防死结界}

Death's Call.name: Death's Call
Death's Call.description:
Trigger A living creature within 20 feet of you dies, or an undead creature within 20 feet of you is destroyed.

Seeing another pass from this world to the next invigorates you. You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the triggering creature's level plus your spellcasting ability modifier. If the triggering creature was undead, double the number of temporary Hit Points you gain. These last for the duration of the spell, and the spell ends if all the temporary Hit Points are depleted earlier.

Debilitating Dichotomy.name: Debilitating Dichotomy
Debilitating Dichotomy.description:
You reveal a glimpse of the impossible conflicts between the

divine anathema behind your curse, forcing you to reckon

with another's conflicts as well.

You and the target each take 9d6 mental damage with a basic Will save, and the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} if it critically fails its save. You get a degree of success one better than you rolled for your saving throw.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 3d6.

Deceiver's Cloak.name: Deceiver's Cloak
Deceiver's Cloak.description:
You wrap yourself in a cloak of illusion, appearing as another creature of the same body shape with roughly similar height and weight as yourself. This has the effects of a 3rd-level @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise}.

Heightened (6th) You can appear as any creature of the same size, even with a completely different body shape.

Deity's Strike.name: Deity's Strike
Deity's Strike.description:
A manifested version of your deity's favored weapon appears in the air above and attacks the target, using your spell attack roll. On a hit, the weapon deals 7d12 force damage, or double damage on a critical hit.

After the attack, whether it succeeds or fails, divine energy bursts from the weapon in a shock wave. It emits in a 10-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line starting from the target and continuing in a direction you choose. Choose an alignment your deity has (chaotic, evil, good, or lawful). Your target and any other creatures within the area of the spell take [[/r 5d6]] damage of the chosen alignment type, with a basic Reflex save. The spell gains the trait of the alignment you choose. If your deity is true neutral, the weapon doesn't create a shock wave.

Heightened (9th) The force damage increases by 1d12 and the alignment damage increases by 1d6. ([[/r 6d6]])

Delay Affliction.name: Delay Affliction
Delay Affliction.description:
With a surge of healing energy, you push back against an affliction threatening the target and grant a small amount of healing. The target recovers 3d8 Hit Points.

You attempt to counteract any one affliction you are aware the target has, suspending its effects for 1 hour on a success rather than removing it.

The target is then temporarily immune to delay affliction for 1 day. You don't need to have identified the name of the specific affliction, but you do need to be aware of it; for instance, you couldn't delay an ingested poison during its onset period unless you were aware of the poison.

Heightened (+1) The target recovers an additional 1d8 Hit Points and you can attempt to suspend an additional affliction.

Delay Consequence.name: Delay Consequence
Delay Consequence.description:
Trigger A creature or object within range is hit by an attack.

You transpose the moment that the target would be injured to later in its timestream. Roll damage normally, but do not reduce Hit Points or apply any other effects of the attack until the spell's duration has elapsed. When the spell ends, the target is immediately affected by the attack, taking damage and being affected by any additional effects. You can Dismiss this spell.

Deluge.name: Deluge
Deluge.description:
You unleash a catastrophic downpour in the area that vanishes an instant later. All flying creatures in the area descend 50 feet or until blocked by the ground or firm surface. Each creature whose descent was blocked by the ground or firm surface takes bludgeoning damage equal to the number of feet it fell (the creature does not also take falling damage) and is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}. Creatures on the ground, including flying creatures forced to the ground by the spell, must succeed at a Reflex save or be pushed 50 feet away from the center of the area.

Flimsy structures in the area collapse. The GM can determine other large-scale effects that result from the deluge.

Heightened (+1) The area increases by 10 feet, and flying creatures fall an additional 10 feet.

Delusional Pride.name: Delusional Pride
Delusional Pride.description:
You make the target overconfident, leading it to ascribe failure to external factors. If the target fails at an attack roll or skill check, it takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls and skill checks until the end of its turn (or the end of its next turn, if it attempted the roll outside its turn). If the creature fails a second time while taking this penalty, the penalty increases to -2. The duration depends on the target's Will save. After attempting its save, the creature becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The duration is 1 round.

Failure The duration is 10 minutes.

Critical Failure The duration is 24 hours.

Demon Form.name: Demon Form
Demon Form.description:
You corrupt yourself with the sin of the Abyss, transforming into a Medium demon battle form. When you cast this spell, choose babau, hezrou, nabasu, or vrock. If you choose hezrou, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the demon and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 20 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points, weakness 5 to cold iron, and weakness 5 to good.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +22, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of demon you choose:

  • Babau Speed 25 feet;
    • Melee 1 longspear (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d4 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • all Strikes deal 2d6 additional precision damage to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.X1kkbRrh4zJuDGjl]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Babau)}

  • Hezrou Speed 30 feet, swim 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet), Damage 2d12+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil, and you can spend an action after a hit to Grab the target;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.sXe7cPazOJbX41GU]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Hezrou)}

  • Nabasu Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hnfQyf05IIa7WPBB]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Nabasu)}

  • Vrock Speed 25 feet, fly 35 feet; resistance 10 to electricity;
    • Melee 1 beak, Damage 2d8+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 talon (agile), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.20egTKICPMhibqgn]{Spell Effect: Demon Form (Vrock)}

Destructive Aura.name: Destructive Aura
Destructive Aura.description:
Swirling sands of divine devastation surround you, weakening the defenses of all they touch. Reduce the resistances of yourself and creatures in the area by 2.

Heightened (+2) Reduce the resistances by an additional 2.

Detect Alignment.name: 侦测阵营 Detect Alignment
Detect Alignment.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

Detect Magic.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
Detect Magic.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

Detect Poison.name: 侦测毒素 Detect Poison
Detect Poison.description:
你可以侦测一个生物是否分泌毒素或者具有毒素，或者一件物体是否是毒素或者已经被下毒。你无法判断目标是否有多种毒素，也无法了解毒素的种类。特定的物质，例如铅或者酒精，是毒素，并会遮盖其他毒素。

升阶 (2环级) 你会得知毒素的数量和类型。

Detect Scrying.name: 侦测探知 Detect Scrying
Detect Scrying.description:
通过深入追踪预言灵光，你能侦测到区域内的探知效果。如果侦测探知的环级高于某个探知效果，你能得到正在探知的生物的一瞥，并且了解其大概的距离和方向。

升阶 (6环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备。

Devil Form.name: Devil Form
Devil Form.description:
You bind yourself to the power of Hell, transforming into a Medium devil battle form. When you cast this spell, choose barbazu, erinys, osyluth, or sarglagon. If you choose osyluth or sarglagon, the battle form is Large and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form you gain the devil and fiend traits. You have hands in this battle form and can use manipulate actions. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of the form that you choose:

  • AC = 22 + your level. Ignore your armor check's penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 5 temporary Hit Points, resistance 5 to physical damage (except silver), and weakness 5 to good.
  • Resistance 10 to fire.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +20, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Strength based (for the purpose of the enfeebled condition, for example). If your attack modifier is higher for the given unarmed attack or weapon, you can use it instead.
  • Athletics modifier of +23, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of devil you choose:

  • Barbazu Speed 35 feet;
    • Melee 1 glaive (deadly d8, forceful, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 persistent bleed;
    • Melee 1 beard, Damage 3d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile), Damage 3d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0yy4t4UY1HqrEo70]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Barbazu)}

  • Erinys Speed 25 feet, fly 40 feet;
    • Melee 1 longsword (versatile P), Damage 1d8+10 slashing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire;
    • Ranged 1 composite longbow (deadly d10, range increment 100 feet, volley), Damage 1d8 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 fire.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.BDMEqBsumguTrMXa]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Erinys)}

  • Osyluth Speed 35 feet, fly 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 jaws, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 claw (agile, reach 10 feet), Damage 2d6 slashing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 stinger (reach 15 feet), Damage 1d10 piercing plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison;
    • Ranged 1 bone shard (range increment 30 feet), Damage 2d6 piercing plus 1d6 evil.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.HEbbxKtBzsLhFead]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Osyluth)}

  • Sarglagon Speed 25 feet, fly 25 feet, swim 30 feet;
    • Melee 1 fangs, Damage 2d10+10 piercing plus 1d6 evil;
    • Melee 1 tentacle arm (agile), Damage 1d8 bludgeoning plus 1d6 evil and 1d6 poison.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fKeZDm8kpDFK5HWp]{Spell Effect: Devil Form (Sarglagon)}

Devour Life.name: Devour Life
Devour Life.description: You attempt to utterly consume the target's life force. The target takes 60 negative damage with a basic Fortitude save. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, it dies immediately. You regain Hit Points equal to half the negative damage the target takes (after applying resistance and the like). Any excess healing is gained as temporary Hit Points, which you lose after 1 minute.

Diabolic Edict.name: Diabolic Edict
Diabolic Edict.description:
You issue a diabolic edict, demanding the target perform a particular task and offering rewards for its fulfillment. It gains a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and skill checks related to performing the task. If it refuses to perform the task you proclaimed, it instead takes a -1 status penalty to all its attack rolls and skill checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1kelGCsoXyGRqMd9]{Spell Effect: Diabolic Edict}

Diamond Dust.name: Diamond Dust
Diamond Dust.description:
You supercool the nearby air, forming a cloud of dancing ice crystals in an emanation around you. A creature other than you that enters the area or ends its turn within the area takes 2d6 cold damage. A creature can take this damage only once per turn. The crystals scatter and refract light; if a light effect enters diamond dust's area, any creatures that effect goes on to affect gain a +2 status bonus to AC and saves against it. While the spell persists, you can activate or deactivate this aura by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. You can Dismiss this spell.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Dim the Light.name: Dim the Light
Dim the Light.description:
Trigger You cast a darkness or shadow spell.

You magnify the darkness from the triggering effect, causing the ambient light level to flicker briefly so you can slip from sight. You can immediately attempt a Stealth check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.XMcnh4cSI32tljXa]{Hide}, and you can become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to a creature even if you don't have cover and aren't otherwise concealed from that creature. You cease being hidden at the end of your turn unless you move into cover or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} before then.

Dimension Door.name: 次元门 Dimension Door
Dimension Door.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

Dimensional Anchor.name: 次元锚 Dimensional Anchor
Dimensional Anchor.description:
你妨碍目标传送以及在次元之间旅行的能力。次元锚会尝试反制任何传送效果，以及任何移动目标到另一个位面的效果。法术持续时间由目标的意志豁免决定。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 该效果持续时间为1分钟。

失败 该效果持续时间为10分钟。

大失败 该效果持续时间为1小时。

Dimensional Assault.name: 次元突袭 Dimensional Assault
Dimensional Assault.description:
你翻身穿越空间，进行一次短距离的次元跳跃，置身在对攻击更加有利于的位置。传送到射程内触及某一生物的任意方格，并随后对触及内一个生物进行一次打击（Strike）。

Note: Conflux spells refresh Spellstrike.

Dimensional Lock.name: 次元锁 Dimensional Lock
Dimensional Lock.description: 你创造一个发出微光的屏障，它会尝试反制进入和离开该区域的传送效果以及位面旅行效果，包括能使用异位面空间的物品（例如次元袋，bag of holding）。次元锁也会阻碍任何在该区域中召唤生物的尝试，但是不会阻止在召唤效果结束后该生物离开。

Dimensional Steps.name: Dimensional Steps
Dimensional Steps.description:
You teleport to a location up to 20 feet away within your line of sight.

Heightened (+1) The distance you can teleport increases by 5 feet.

Dinosaur Form.name: 恐龙形态 Dinosaur Form
Dinosaur Form.description:
你引导原能力量将自身变形为大型动物战斗形态，并指定强大而可怕的恐龙为自身形态。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。当你施放该法术时，选择甲龙、雷龙、恐爪龙、剑龙、三角龙、或者暴龙。你可以决定动物的特定类型，但这对该形态的体型及数据没有影响。处于该形态时，你获得动物和恐龙特征。你可以解消该法术。

你获得后续数据和能力，无论你选择哪种战斗形态：

  • AC=18+你的等级。忽略你的护甲检定减值和速度减值。
  • 15临时生命值。
  • 昏暗视觉和非精准嗅觉30尺。
  • 一个或多个由你选择的战斗形态决定的无武装近战攻击，这是你仅能使用的攻击。你对这些攻击受训。你的攻击调整值为+16、伤害调整值为+9。这些攻击基于力量（例如对于 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled} 状态而言）。如果你的无武装攻击调整值更高，你能改为使用该调整值。
  • 运动（Athletics）调整值+18，除非你自身的调整值更高。

你也会根据你选择的形态获得特定能力：

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.0Cyf07wboRp4CmcQ]{甲龙 Ankylosaurus}
    • 速度 25尺；
    • 近战 1 尾（后摆，触及10尺）, 伤害 2d6 钝击;
    • 近战 1 脚, 伤害 2d6 钝击.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.KkDRRDuycXwKPa6n]{雷龙 Brontosaurus}
    • 速度 25尺;
    • 近战 1 尾（触及15尺）, 伤害 2d6 钝击;
    • 近战 1 脚, 伤害 2d8 钝击.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.oJbcmpBSHwmx6FD4]{恐爪龙 Deinonychus}
    • 速度 40尺;
    • 近战 1 爪（灵巧）, 伤害 2d4 穿刺加 [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害};
    • 近战 1 咬, 伤害 1d10 穿刺.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T6XnxvsgvvOrpien]{剑龙 Stegosaurus}
    • 速度 30尺;
    • 近战 1 尾（触及10尺）, 伤害 2d8 穿刺.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.iOKhr2El8R6cz6YI]{三角龙 Triceratops}
    • 速度 30尺;
    • 近战 1 角, 伤害 2d8 穿刺, 加上重击时 [[/r {1d6}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续流血伤害};
    • 近战 1 脚, 伤害 2d6 钝击.
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.542Keo6txtq7uvqe]{暴龙 Tyrannosaurus}
    • 速度 30尺;
    • 近战 1 咬（致死，触及10尺）, 伤害 1d12 穿刺;
    • 近战 1 尾（触及10尺）, 伤害 1d10 钝击.

升阶 (5环级) 你的战斗形态为超大型，并且你的攻击具有15尺触及，或者如果其初始具有15 尺触及，则为20尺触及。你改为获得20临时生命值、攻击调整值+18、伤害加值+6且伤害骰子翻倍、运动+21。

升阶 (7环级) 你的战斗形态为巨型，并且你的攻击具有20尺触及，或者如果其初始具有15 尺触及，则为25尺触及。你改为获得AC=21+你的等级、25临时生命值、攻击调整值+25、伤害加值+15、伤害骰子翻倍、运动+25。

Dirge of Doom.name: Dirge of Doom
Dirge of Doom.description: Foes within the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. They can't reduce their Frightened value below 1 while they remain in the area.

Disappearance.name: 无影无踪 Disappearance
Disappearance.description: 你遮蔽了其他生物对一个生物的感知。目标为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected}, 不仅仅是视觉，而是所有感官，令目标对于无论使用什么精确或者模糊感官的观察者而言，均视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}。生物仍然可以通过搜索（Seeking），寻找被拨开的尘土，寻找声谱中的空当，或者通过其他方式来发现一个无法被其他方式发现的生物。

Discern Lies.name: 辨识谎言 Discern Lies
Discern Lies.description: 谎言如同不和谐音一般在你的耳中鸣响。你在对某人撒谎的觉察检定上获得+4状态加值。

Discern Location.name: 感知位置 Discern Location
Discern Location.description: 你得知目标所在地点的名称（包括建筑，所在社区，以及地区）以及所处于的位面。你只能以你曾经见过的，具有一个其重要所属物的，或者具有其身体一部分的生物为目标。以一个物体为目标式，你必须曾经接触过它或者拥有其一部分。感知位置自动克服比该法术环级低的对抗侦测和预言的防护，即使这通常有可能会阻断该法术。

Discern Secrets.name: Discern Secrets
Discern Secrets.description:
You call upon your patron's power to better uncover secrets.

When you Cast the Spell, the target can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge}, @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek}, or @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1xRFPTFtWtGJ9ELw]{Sense Motive}. The target gains a +1 status bonus to the skill or Perception used for the roll, and this bonus remains as long as you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.3f5DMFu8fPiqHpRg]{Sustain the Spell}.

The target is temporarily immune to discern secrets for 1 minute.

Heightened (5th) You can target two creatures instead of one.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.hdOb5Iu6Zd3pHoGI]{Spell Effect: Discern Secrets (Recall Knowledge)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.m1tQTBrolf7uZBW0]{Spell Effect: Discern Secrets (Seek)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.dEsaufFnfYihu5Ex]{Spell Effect: Discern Secrets (Sense Motive)}

Disintegrate.name: 解离术 Disintegrate
Disintegrate.description:
你向目标发射一道绿色射线。尝试一次法术攻击。你造成12d10伤害，并且目标必须尝试一次基础强韧豁免。在重击时，将豁免结果视为差1级。被减少到0HP的生物会化作细微粉尘；其装备会保留。你命中的物体会被摧毁（无豁免），无论硬度如何，除非它是一件神器，或者其他类似地难以摧毁。一次施法能够摧毁不超过10尺立方的物质。这会自动摧毁任何力场结构，例如力墙术。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d10。

Disjunction.name: 裂解术 Disjunction
Disjunction.description: 破坏能量撕碎目标。你可以尝试反制目标。如果你成功，目标会失效1星期。在大成功时，它会被摧毁。如果这是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

Dismantle.name: Dismantle
Dismantle.description:
You touch an object, and it immediately disassembles itself into its component pieces. The spell fails if the target lacks component pieces (such as a statue carved from one block of stone), and using it on a dangerous object like a snare or trap typically triggers it. The object gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} condition, and the component pieces become small enough to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} under normal clothing and armor. You can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.AjLSHZSWQ90exdLo]{Dismiss} the spell. When the spell ends, the object reassembles itself into its original form, appearing in your hand or hands if you have them free, or on the ground in front of you otherwise. Once reassembled, the object loses the Broken condition and its Hit Points return to the value the object had when you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast the Spell}.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts for 10 minutes.

Heightened (6th) The spell lasts until your next daily preparations.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法 Dispel Magic
Dispel Magic.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

Disperse into Air.name: Disperse into Air
Disperse into Air.description:
Trigger You take damage from an enemy or a hazard.

After taking the triggering damage, you transform into air. Until the end of the current turn, you can't be attacked or targeted, you don't take up space, you can't act, and any auras or emanations you have are suppressed. At the end of the turn, you re-form in any space you can occupy within 15 feet of where you were when you dispersed. Any auras or emanations you had are restored as long as their duration didn't run out while you were dispersed.

Disrupt Undead.name: 打击死灵 Disrupt Undead
Disrupt Undead.description:
你用能量贯穿目标。你造成1d6加上你的施法属性调整值的正能量伤害。目标必须尝试一次基础强韧豁免。如果该生物在豁免中大失败，它也会获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}，持续1轮。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d6。

Disrupting Weapons.name: 毁灭武器 Disrupting Weapons
Disrupting Weapons.description:
你将正能量灌注于武器中。使用这些武器的攻击对不死生物造成额外1d4正能量伤害。

升阶 (3环级) 该伤害增加到2d4。

升阶 (5环级) 目标为至多三个武器，并且该伤害增加到3d4。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.X7RD0JRxhJV9u2LC]{法术效果：毁灭武器}

Distracting Chatter.name: Distracting Chatter
Distracting Chatter.description:
You bombard a target with distracting auditory illusions, surrounding them with a tumultuous cacophony of overlapping speech, whispers, screams, and muttering. The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed}, takes a -2 status penalty to purely auditory Perception checks, and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to use auditory abilities or verbal spell components. Similarly, a creature who attempts to affect the target with an auditory effect must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or the attempt fails. The duration depends on the target's Will save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The duration is 1 round.

Failure The duration is 3 rounds.

Critical Failure The duration is 1 minute.

Heightened (7th) You can target up to five creatures.

Div Pact.name: Div Pact
Div Pact.description:
You call upon the powers of Abaddon to grant you the assistance of a div. You call upon a div whose level can be no more than double div pact's spell level, two divs whose levels are each at least 2 less than double the spell level, or three divs whose levels are each at least 3 less than double the spell level.

Critical Success You conjure the div or divs, and they require nothing in return for their service.

Success You conjure the div or divs. They are not eager to pursue the task, so they require a favor in return.

Failure you don't conjure any divs.

Critical Failure You don't conjure any divs, and they send a spiritual backlash that denies your use of any of your innate divine spells for 24 hours. If you are under the effect of any of your innate divine spells, the durations end.

Divine Armageddon.name: Divine Armageddon
Divine Armageddon.description:
You call forth a divine cataclysm from your deity, destroying living and undead creatures in the area alike. Creatures in the area take 10d6 Negative Damage and [[/r 10d6]] alignment damage (good, evil, lawful, or chaotic), chosen from among the alignments your deity has. If your deity is true neutral, increase the negative damage by [[/r {4d6}[negative]]]{4d6 Negative Damage} instead of dealing alignment damage. A creature harmed by positive damage, such as one with negative healing, takes positive damage instead of negative damage from this spell.

You can't cast this spell if you don't have a deity. This spell gains the trait corresponding to the alignment damage dealt.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6 negative damage, [[/r 1d6]] alignment damage, and 1d6 additional negative and positive damage for a true neutral deity.

Divine Aura.name: 神圣灵光 Divine Aura
Divine Aura.description:
神圣的能量保护目标，每个目标在区域内时，赋予其AC和豁免上的+1状态加值。

选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。在对抗由法术所对立的阵营（你选择混乱时为守序，选择善良时为邪恶）的生物的攻击，以及这样的生物创造的效果时，法术赋予的加值提升到+2。在对抗由这样的生物所创造的，会赋予你的神圣灵光的目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{被控制 Controlled} 状态效果，以及对抗与你的神圣灵光所对立阵营的效果所召唤的生物时，该加值增加到+4。

当一个对立阵营的生物通过近战攻击命中目标时，该生物必须成功通过一次意志豁免，否则会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} 1分钟。然后它会暂时免疫1分钟。

当你每轮第一次维持该法术时，神圣灵光的半径增加10尺。

Divine Decree.name: 神圣裁决 Divine Decree
Divine Decree.description:
你呢喃你信仰中的一段强大祷词，这是会伤害对立你的信念之人的敕令。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。你对区域内生物造成7d10伤害；每个生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。具有你所选择的阵营的生物不受法术影响。阵营既不对应也不对立的目标，将其豁免结果视为更好一级，并且不会承受伤害以外的额外效果。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}，持续1分钟。

大失败 该生物承受双倍伤害，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} ，持续1分钟。在你的原属位面，一个在豁免中大失败生物生物会如同在 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{放逐术 Banishment} 豁免中失败一般被放逐。10级或者更低的生物必须尝试一次意志豁免。在失败时，它会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} 1分钟；在大失败时，它会死亡。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，并且在豁免大失败时必须尝试第二次豁免的生物等级增加2。

Divine Inspiration.name: 神圣启言 Divine Inspiration
Divine Inspiration.description: 你赋予目标精神能量，刷新其魔法力量。如果它准备法术，它回复一个6环级或者更低的今日已经施放的法术，并且能够再次施放该法术。如果它自发施放法术，它回复一个6环级或者更低的法术位。如果它具有聚能池，它回复其聚能点，如同经过再聚能。

Divine Lance.name: 圣枪术 Divine Lance
Divine Lance.description:
你施放一道神圣能量的射线。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。对目标尝试一次远程法术攻击，对抗目标的AC。命中时，目标承受所选择阵营类型的伤害，数值等于1d4+你的施法属性调整值（在重击时翻倍）。该法术获得你选择的阵营的特征。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d4。

Divine Plagues.name: Divine Plagues
Divine Plagues.description:
Your deity sends wracking plagues. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. When you Cast the Spell, decide whether the disease inflicts the Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Stupefied condition.

Divine Plague (disease) Level 1

Stage 1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1}, or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1}, and Clumsy 1, Enfeebled 1, or Stupefied 1 (1 round)

Stage 3 Clumsy 1, Enfeebled 1, or Stupefied 1 and the target can't recover from the condition until they are cured (1 day)

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is afflicted with divine plague at stage 1.

Critical Failure The target is afflicted with divine plague at stage 2.

Heightened (5th) The divine plague disease gains the virulent trait. The condition value for the Clumsy, Enfeebled, or Stupefied condition is 2 instead of 1.

Divine Vessel.name: 神圣化身 Divine Vessel
Divine Vessel.description:
你将异界的能量引入躯体；你仍然是你自身的同时，获得你的神祇使徒之一的特性。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。

如果你本来为中型或者更小，你变为大型，如同 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wzctak6BxOW8xvFV]{变巨术 Enlarge}的效果。你必须有空间扩大体型，否则你会失去法术。你也会获得下列好处：

  • 40临时生命值。
  • 等于你的速度的飞行速度。
  • 对你选择阵营的对立阵营的弱点（weakness） 10。
  • A 对抗法术的豁免上+1状态加值。
  • 黑暗视觉。
  • 你的无武装攻击和武器造成1点选择阵营类型的额外伤害。
  • 1个或者更多无武装近战攻击。如果你选择善良或者秩序，你的拳攻击造成2d8伤害。如果你选择混乱，你获得咬无武装攻击，造成2d10穿刺伤害。如果你选择邪恶，你获得爪无武装攻击，造成2d8挥砍伤害，并且具有灵巧（agile）和娴熟（finesse）特征。

Divine Wrath.name: 神圣狂怒 Divine Wrath
Divine Wrath.description:
你引导你的神祇的怒火，攻击对立阵营的敌人。选择一个你的神祇具有的阵营。（混乱，邪恶，善良，或者秩序）。如果你没有神祇，或者你的神祇是绝对中立，你无法施放该法术。该法术具有你选择的阵营的特征。你造成你所选阵营类型的4d10伤害；每个区域中的生物必须尝试一次强韧豁免。对应你所选阵营的生物不受影响。既不对应也不对立的生物将其豁免骰结果视为更好一级。

大成功 该生物不受影响。

成功 该生物承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物承受完整伤害，并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}。

大失败 该生物承受全部伤害，并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}; 当其恶心时，也会 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10。

Diviner's Sight.name: Diviner's Sight
Diviner's Sight.description: You glimpse into the target's future. Roll a d20; when the target attempts a non-secret saving throw or skill check, it can use the number you rolled instead of rolling, and the spell ends. Alternatively, you can instead reveal the result of the die roll for one of the target's secret checks during the duration, and the spell ends. Casting it again ends any active diviner's sight you have cast, as well as any active diviner's sight on the target.

Divinity Leech.name: Divinity Leech
Divinity Leech.description:
You disrupt the connection between a divine caster or deific servitor and their deity, blocking their use of divine power. If the target fails its save, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued}.

For the spell's duration, whenever the target casts a divine spell, you regain [[/r {6d6}[healing]]]{6d6 Hit Points} and the target must attempt another Will save with the following effects.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success Each target of the divine spell has an outcome one degree of success better than the result it rolled.

Failure The divine spell is lost and target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} for 1 round.

Dominate.name: 支配术 Dominate
Dominate.description:
你操控目标，强行令其服从你的命令。如果你赋予一项明显是自灭的命令，目标不会行动，直到你下达新的命令。该效果基于其意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} 以抵抗你的命令。

失败 你控制了目标，其获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{被控制 Controlled} 状态，但在每轮结束时可以尝试一次意志豁免。成功时，法术结束。

大失败 如同失败，但是仅当你施加违抗其天性的命令，例如杀害其盟友时，才会获得新的豁免。

升阶 (10环级) 该持续时间为无限。

Door to Beyond.name: Door to Beyond
Door to Beyond.description:
Striking at thin air, you create hairline cracks in an unoccupied adjacent space that lead somewhere outside reality. Air rushes through the cracks, drawing Large or smaller creatures and objects of light Bulk or less toward the center. Large or smaller creatures in the area must attempt a Fortitude save at the start of their turn; creatures that move into the area must attempt the save on entering.

The cracks of the door to beyond are too thin for anything to fully slip through, but decompressive effects deal 4d6 slashing damage to any creature or object that ends its turn in the door's space. You are unaffected by your own door to beyond. You can Dismiss the spell.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is pulled 10 feet toward the door.

Critical Failure The creature is pulled 20 feet toward the door.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d6.

Downpour.name: Downpour
Downpour.description:
You call forth a torrential downpour, which extinguishes nonmagical flames. Creatures in the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} and gain fire resistance 10. Creatures outside the area are Concealed to those inside the area. Creatures with weakness to water that end their turns in the area take damage equal to their weakness.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.LMXxICrByo7XZ3Q3]{Spell Effect: Downpour}

Heightened (+1) The fire resistance increases by 2.

Draconic Barrage.name: Draconic Barrage
Draconic Barrage.description:
You shape energy into one incorporeal tiny dragon (or serpentine creature) that flits around you. The specific dragon is random; roll [[/r 1d6 #dragon]] on the table below for each dragon evoked to determine which type of dragon you create. While the spell persists, you can command one of your dragons to spit a missile of energy at a creature within 60 feet by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This is a ranged Strike that uses your spell attack bonus and deals 1d6 damage plus your spellcasting ability modifier, with the damage type depending on the dragon. A dragon's breath Strike uses and contributes to your multiple attack penalty. Once a dragon has used its breath Strike, it winks out of existence; when you have no dragons remaining, the spell ends.

Draconic Barrage

d6 Dragon Breath Strike type
1 Copper or Black Acid
2 Silver or White Cold
3 Bronze or Blue Electricity
4 Brass, Gold, or Red Fire
5 Green Poison
6 Your choice of dragon As the dragon

Heightened (+1) You shape 1 additional dragon, and the Strike damage increases by 1d6.

    • 近战 1 尾（触及10尺）, 伤害 3d10 钝击;
    • 喷吐武器30尺锥形, [[/r {10d6}[cold]]]{10d6 寒冷}.

升阶 (8环级) 你的战斗形态为巨型，你的飞行速度+20尺状态加值、并且你的攻击具有10尺触及（如果本来为10尺触及则为15尺）。你改为获得AC=21+你的等级、15临时HP、攻击调整值+28、伤害加值+12、运动+28、以及喷吐武器伤害 [[/r +14]] 状态加值。

Dragon Wings.name: Dragon Wings
Dragon Wings.description:
Leathery wings sprout from your back, giving you a fly Speed of 60 feet or your Speed, whichever is faster. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.TTwOKGqmZeKSyNMH]{Feather Fall}.

You can increase the Focus Point cost by 1 to gain the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.K8vvrOgW4bGakXxm]{Dragon Claws} as long as the wings last.

Heightened (8th) The duration increases to 10 minutes.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.V7jAnItnVqtfCAKt]{Spell Effect: Dragon Wings (60 Feet)}

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jy4edd6pvJvJgOSP]{Spell Effect: Dragon Wings (Own Speed)}

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description:
You close your hand and pull life energy from another creature into yourself. This deals 3d4 negative damage; the target must attempt a basic Fortitude save.

You gain temporary Hit Points equal to the damage the target takes, after resolving its save and applying your blood magic if applicable. If the target's Hit Points were lower than the damage you dealt, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to their remaining Hit Points instead. The temporary Hit Points last for 1 minute.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d4.

Draw Ire.name: Draw Ire
Draw Ire.description:
You cause mental distress to a creature, goading it to strike back at you. You deal 1d10 mental damage to the creature and cause it to take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls against creatures other than you. The creature must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target takes half damage and the penalty. The spell ends at the end of the target's next turn. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.PDoTV4EhJp63FEaG]{Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Success)}

Failure The target takes full damage and the penalty. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.BsGZdgiEElNlgZVv]{Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Failure)}

Critical Failure The target takes double damage, and the status penalty is -2. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4VOZP2ArmS12nvz8]{Spell Effect: Draw Ire (Critical Failure)}

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.

Draw the Lightning.name: Draw the Lightning
Draw the Lightning.description:
Calling out to the skies, you summon a bolt of lightning to strike through a foe above you and down into your weapon or your body, charging it with electrical power. You must hold your weapon or an empty hand aloft as part of this spell's somatic component. When you do, a bolt of lightning descends from a storm cloud in the air above your and through the target, dealing 3d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save. For the rest of the spell's duration, your first Strike each round with the weapon you held aloft (or with your unarmed attacks if you held an empty hand aloft) deals an additional 1d12 electricity damage.

The spell creates its own storm cloud if necessary, so you can cast draw the lightning anywhere, even underground. If draw the lightning is cast outside under a cloudy or stormy sky, increase the bolt's damage by [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]].

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.fCIT9YgGUwIc3Z9G]{Spell Effect: Draw the Lightning}

Heightened (8th) The damage dealt to the initial target increases by 4d12, and the additional damage dealt on the first Strike each turn increases by 1d12.

Dread Ambience.name: Dread Ambience
Dread Ambience.description:
In some places, it always feels like something is observing you, as if the very land doesn't want you there. Hostile creatures skitter about in the underbrush. Tendrils of mist try to lead you stray. Even the scent of the place is unwelcoming. Sometimes, this eerie atmosphere is a natural occurrence. Other times, it's the result of the dread ambience ritual.

To create this unwelcoming, intimidating aura, you must prepare the area with salts and herbs, traveling the entire edge of the area throughout the casting.

After you complete your ritual, anyone who enters the area receives a status penalty to saving throws against fear effects within the dread ambience.

Critical Success The sense of dread is particularly powerful. Every creature in an area takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.FT5Tt2DKBRutDqbV]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Critical Success)}

Success The dread ambience succeeds. Every creature in the area takes a -1 status penalty to saving throws against fear effects. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.1gTnFmfLUQnCo3TK]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Success)}

Failure The dread ambience fails.

Critical Failure The dread ambience fails, and the casters take a -1 status penalty to all Will saves for the next week. @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.4Lt69zSeYElEfDrZ]{Spell Effect: Dread Ambience (Critical Failure)}

Heightened (7th) The dread ambience costs 750 gp and remains in place for 10 years.

Heightened (9th) The dread ambience costs 5,000 gp and remains in place for an unlimited duration.

Dread Aura.name: Dread Aura
Dread Aura.description: You emit an aura of terror. Foes in the area are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} and unable to reduce the condition.

Dread Secret.name: Dread Secret
Dread Secret.description:
You utter a powerful secret at odds with the fundamental nature of the target creatures. Choose a specific resistance or weakness that you believe one or more of the targets have due to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.1OagaWtBpVXExToo]{Recall Knowledge} or previous experience with the targets, such as resistance to fire or weakness to silver. If the information is incorrect for a given target, the spell has no effect on that target. Affected targets must attempt a Will saving throw.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes 1 damage of the type of weakness you chose (thus triggering the creature's weakness), or loses its resistance until the end of your next turn if you chose a resistance.

Failure As success, and the creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} from the revelation of its dread secret.

Critical Failure As failure, except the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 3}.

Dream Council.name: 梦境会议 Dream Council
Dream Council.description: 当你施放该法术时，任何目标（包括你）可以选择立即入睡。若任何生物不选择入睡，则法术结束。入睡者会进入一个共享的梦境，它们能互相交流，如同在同一个房间一般。目标各自与苏醒时离开该共享梦境，并且如果所有目标苏醒时法术结束。

Dream Message.name: 托梦术 Dream Message
Dream Message.description:
你向你的目标的梦境中发送一段信息。该信息只能单向，至多为1分钟的谈话（大概150词）。如果目标入眠，它会立即收到信息。否则，它会在下一次入眠时收到。当它收到信息时，法术结束，并且你会知晓信息已送达。

升阶 (4环级) 你能以至多10个你知晓并且曾遇见过的生物为目标。你必须向它们每个人发送相同的信息；该法术为不同目标分别计算结束。

Dreamer's Call.name: Dreamer's Call
Dreamer's Call.description:
The target becomes distracted and suggestible, inundated by vivid daydreams.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target's attention wavers. It becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} by its daydreams.

Failure As success, except that you appear in the dream and give a suggestion. This can be to approach you, run away (as if it had the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} condition), Release what it's holding, Drop @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}, or stand in place. The creature follows this course of action as its first action after you Cast the Spell.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target follows the course of action for as many actions as possible for the spell's duration, and it does nothing else.

Dreaming Potential.name: 梦境训练 Dreaming Potential
Dreaming Potential.description: 你令目标进入清醒梦中，这里他可以在无穷变换的梦景中探索自身的无穷可能性。如果它完整8小时睡眠未被打扰，当其醒来时，它视为花费了一整天休整期以重训，但它不能使用梦境训练来进行需要导师或者它在梦境中无法得到的特殊知识的重训。

Drop Dead.name: 假死术 Drop Dead
Drop Dead.description:
触发 射程内的一个生物被敌人一次攻击命中。

目标看起来如同身亡倒地，但它其实是 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}了。其幻象尸体留在其倒下的地方，并且有可信的致命伤。该幻象看起来感觉起来都如同尸体。如果目标的死亡看起来很怪异——例如，一个满血的野蛮人被2点伤害杀死——GM可以赋予攻击者一次立即的察觉检定，以不相信幻觉。如果目标使用敌对动作，该法术结束。这会结束整个法术，幻象尸体也会一同消失。

升阶 (7环级) 该法术不会再目标使用敌对动作时结束。

Dull Ambition.name: Dull Ambition
Dull Ambition.description:
You curse the target to fail in all avenues of its life that require drive and ambition, as it inadvertently undermines its own goals at every turn. The effect is based on the target's Will save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success For 1 hour, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls.

Failure For 1 day, the target rolls twice and uses the lower result on initiative rolls and any check to determine the success of a downtime activity.

Critical Failure As failure, but the duration is unlimited.

Duplicate Foe.name: 仿敌拟像 Duplicate Foe
Duplicate Foe.description:
你创造一个敌人的临时复制品，并为你而战。目标可以尝试一次强韧豁免来干扰法术。复制体会在目标相邻的未被占据的空间出现，并且具有目标的攻击调整值，AC，豁免调整值，觉察，以及技能调整值，但它只有70生命值并且缺少目标的特殊能力，包括免疫，抗力以及弱点。除了武器潜力（potency）符文，它没有任何魔法物品。该复制品获得仆从特征，并且它只能行走（Stride）和打击（Strike）。其打击（Strike）对目标造成普通伤害，并不会附加额外效果，因为其没有特殊能力。法术在复制品生命值降低到0时自动结束。该复制品会尽其所能攻击你的敌人。你也可以尝试给予其另外的指令；当你维持该法术时，你能以你的动作的一部分命令仆从，但是GM决定复制品是否会按照你的命令行动。复制品并不稳定，在每轮进行行动之后，它失去4d6生命值。它不是活物，所以无法以任何方式回复失去的生命值。

大成功 你创造复制品失败。

成功 复制品的打击（Strike）造成一半的伤害，并且持续时间降低到最大2轮。

失败 该复制品如描述运作。

升阶 (+1) 你可以作为目标的生物等级增加2。复制品的生命值增加10。

Dust Storm.name: Dust Storm
Dust Storm.description:
You call forth a swirling storm of dust. The dust storm obscures vision, with the effect of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9XHmC2JgTUIQ1CCm]{Obscuring Mist}. The dust also makes the air unbreathable; creatures in the area must hold their breath, though wearing a scarf or similar clothing over the mouth increases the time the creature can hold its breath to 5 rounds. Creatures entering or starting their turn in the dust storm take 1d6 slashing damage. Creatures that have the water trait or that are made primarily of liquid take double damage.

Heightened (+2) The damage increases by 1d6.

Dutiful Challenge.name: Dutiful Challenge
Dutiful Challenge.description:
As you challenge an enemy, you take some of its attention away from your allies. The target takes a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than you, and you take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, damage rolls, and skill checks against creatures other than the target.

Each time a creature other than you uses a hostile action that affects the challenged enemy, the enemy can attempt a Will save. On a success, the enemy no longer takes the penalty against that creature. You can Dismiss the spell, and it ends automatically if you or the target is defeated.

Heightened (+3) The status penalties increase by 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.UH2sT6eW5e31Xytd]{Spell Effect: Dutiful Challenge}

Déjà Vu.name: Déjà Vu
Déjà Vu.description:
You loop a thought process in the target's mind, forcing it to repeat the same actions over again. The target must attempt a Will save. If the target fails, whatever actions the target uses on its next turn, it must repeat on its following turn. The actions must be repeated in the same order and as close to the same specifics as possible. For example, if the target makes an attack, it must repeat the attack against the same creature, if possible, and if the target moves, it must move the same distance and direction, if possible, on its next turn.

If the target can't repeat an action, such as @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Casting a Spell} that has been exhausted or needing to target a creature that has died, it can act as it chooses for that action but becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} until the end of its turn.

Earthbind.name: 地缚术 Earthbind
Earthbind.description:
你使用大地的重量以干扰目标的飞行能力，其效果基于强韧豁免。如果该生物安全到达地面，它不会承受坠落伤害。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标安全坠落至多120尺。

失败 目标安全坠落至多120尺。如果它碰到地面，它1轮内不能飞行，浮空或者以其他方式离开地面。

大失败 目标安全坠落至多120尺。如果它碰到地面，它1分钟内不能飞行，浮空或者以其他方式离开地面。

Earthquake.name: 地震术 Earthquake
Earthquake.description:
你震撼大地，将生物绊入裂谷，并且摧毁建筑。在特定环境中，GM可能会增加额外的效果。悬崖可能会崩塌，造成生物坠落，湖可能会由于其下方的裂隙而干涸，剩下一片流沙陷阱。

  • 震撼大地 地面成为困难地形，其上的生物在攻击骰，AC以及技能检定上承受-2环境减值。
  • 裂隙 每个在地面上的生物必须在其回合开始时尝试一次反射豁免，以站稳脚步来避免坠落到脚下裂开的40尺深的缝隙中。这些裂隙是永久的，攀爬其侧面需要DC15的运动检定。
  • 崩塌 建筑物和顶棚可能会崩塌。GM为每个建筑骰一次纯骰检定（坚固建筑DC16，常规建筑和多数自然结构DC14，粗劣建筑DC9，GM均可按合适调整其高低）。崩塌造成11d6钝击伤害；每个处于崩塌中的生物必须对其尝试一次反射豁免来避免。

大成功 该生物承受一半的崩塌伤害。

成功 该生物承受一半的崩塌伤害，并且 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。

失败 该生物承受完整崩塌伤害，并且倒地。

大失败 该生物承受完整崩塌伤害，并且坠入裂隙。

升阶 (10环级) 你可以创造一个范围巨大的足以摧毁一个聚居地的地震。射程增加到半英里，范围为四分之一英里爆发。

Echoing Weapon.name: Echoing Weapon
Echoing Weapon.description:
You channel magical energy into the target weapon, and the air around it faintly hums each time you strike a blow, as the impact is absorbed into the weapon. If a creature is wielding the weapon at the end of its turn, the weapon discharges a burst of sound targeting one creature adjacent to the wielder (if any). The sonic damage this deals is equal to the number of successful Strikes with the target weapon that the wielder made that turn (to a maximum of 4 sonic damage if the wielder hits with four Strikes).

Heightened (+2) The sonic damage increases by 1 per Strike (and the maximum damage increases by 4).

Eclipse Burst.name: 噬星爆发 Eclipse Burst
Eclipse Burst.description:
一个冰寒漆黑的球体在区域中爆炸，对区域中的生物造成8d10寒冷伤害，以及对活物8d4额外负能量伤害。在区域中的每个生物必须尝试一次反射豁免。如果该球体复盖了一个魔法光源的区域，或者影响了一个会受到魔法光照影响的生物，噬星会尝试反制光亮效果。

大成功 该生物或者物体不受影响。

成功 该生物或者物体承受一半伤害。

失败 该生物或者物体承受完整伤害。

大失败 该生物或者物体承受双倍伤害。如果它是生物，他会因这黑暗而 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}，持续时间无限。

升阶 (+1) 该寒冷伤害增加1d10，并且对活物的负能量伤害增加1d4。

Ectoplasmic Expulsion.name: Ectoplasmic Expulsion
Ectoplasmic Expulsion.description: You call upon tendrils of ephemeral ectoplasm to pass through the target and carry away a harmful psychic affliction. You immediately attempt to counteract a single effect on the target with the emotion or possession trait, or an effect giving the target the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated} condition. If you fail to counteract the effect, you nevertheless set up a resonance that allows the target to more ably escape the effect on its own; for the next hour, the target gains a +2 status bonus to Will saves to shrug off the effect you failed to counteract (such as Will saves to shake off control by the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.wU6hNzK8Yfqdmc8m]{Possession} spell).

Ectoplasmic Interstice.name: Ectoplasmic Interstice
Ectoplasmic Interstice.description: You force the Material and Ethereal Planes to partially overlap, creating a zone that causes incorporeal and spiritual entities to take on many of the aspects of corporeal creatures. Within the ectoplasmic interstice, incorporeal creatures cannot pass through solid objects or corporeal creatures, and they can manipulate and attempt Strength-based checks against physical creatures and objects. An incorporeal PC or other creature with a normal Strength modifier simply uses that modifier, but if the creature had a Strength modifier of -5, like most incorporeal monsters, it uses a +4 modifier instead, increasing its Athletics modifier by 9 accordingly. Attacks against creatures that are within the interstice overcome resistances as if they were by @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{Ghost Touch} weapons.

Efficient Apport.name: Efficient Apport
Efficient Apport.description:
Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort. Whether it's your spellbook, a reagent, or a glass of wine, it's simply more efficient to call it to your hand. You teleport the target into your open hand. If you don't have a hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet.

Heightened (3rd) You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less

Heightened (5th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

Heightened (7th) The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.

Eidolon's Wrath.name: Eidolon's Wrath
Eidolon's Wrath.description:
Your eidolon releases a powerful energy attack that deals 5d6 damage of the type you chose when you took the Eidolon's Wrath feat, with a basic Reflex save.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 2d6.

Eject Soul.name: Eject Soul
Eject Soul.description:
Your touch disrupts the connection between body and soul, possibly forcing the soul out of the body altogether. The target must attempt a Fortitude save. You can allow allies to choose the degree of success instead of rolling a saving throw.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1} as its soul briefly loses its connection to its body.

Critical Failure The target's soul exits its body for 1 round. The target's body becomes Stunned. While its body is stunned in this way, the target remains fully aware in soul form; it simply can't consciously move its body (though the body makes basic instinctual defensive movements). The target's soul has the incorporeal trait, is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}, and has a fly Speed of 60 feet. It can't attack, cast spells, or attempt any skill checks that require a physical body, and it must always maintain line of effect to its body. When the target's body ceases being stunned, the target's soul instantly returns to its body as the target wakes.

Heightened (+3) If a willing ally chooses to critically fail, it can stay in soul form for 1 additional round.

Electric Arc.name: 电弧击 Electric Arc
Electric Arc.description:
一段电弧从一个目标跳跃到另一个目标。你造成1d4+你的施法属性调整值的伤害。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d4。

Electrified Crystal Ward.name: Electrified Crystal Ward
Electrified Crystal Ward.description:
You create an @Compendium[pf2e.hazards.491qhVbjsHnOuMZW]{Electric Latch Rune} hazard on the target, creating a special crystalline lock on the object. You can also substitute your spell DC for any of the hazard's listed DCs. You can have only one such hazard active at a time, and if you cast this spell while a previous electric latch rune is active, the older hazard discharges harmlessly.

Heightened (+2) The hazard's damage increases by 1d12.

Element Embodied.name: Element Embodied
Element Embodied.description:
Drawing upon the deepest wells of magic in an elemental plane, you transform into a spectacular elemental. You can choose between an air elemental, earth elemental, fire elemental, or water elemental. Your battle form is Gargantuan, and you must have enough space to expand into or the spell is lost. While in this form, you gain the elemental trait and the trait for the element you choose. You can Dismiss the spell.

You gain the following statistics and abilities regardless of which battle form you choose:

  • AC = 25 + your level. Ignore your armor's check penalty and Speed reduction.
  • 30 temporary Hit Points.
  • Darkvision.
  • One or more attacks specific to the battle form you choose, which are the only attacks you can use. You're trained with them. Your attack modifier is +34, and you use the listed damage. These attacks are Dexterity based if you choose an air or fire elemental, or Strength based if you choose an earth or water elemental. (This distinction doesn't change the statistics, but matters for the enfeebled and clumsy conditions, for example). If your unarmed attack modifier is higher, you can use it instead.
  • Acrobatics modifier of +36 for air or fire elemental or Athletics modifier of +36 for earth or water elemental, unless your own modifier is higher.

You also gain specific abilities based on the type of elemental you choose:

  • Air Elemental fly Speed 80 feet;
    • High Winds (air, aura) 30 feet. Air within the emanation is difficult terrain for flying creatures that don't have the air trait;
    • Swiftness Your movement doesn't trigger reactions;
    • Melee 1 gust (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+11 bludgeoning plus Push 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 lightning lash (range increment 80 feet), Damage 3d12+4 electricity.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.J60rN48XzBGHmR6m]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Air)}

  • Earth Elemental 30 feet, burrow 20 feet; resistance 5 to physical;
    • Spike Stones (aura, earth) 30 feet. The area is difficult terrain and hazardous terrain. A creature without the earth trait that moves on the ground in the area takes 5 piercing damage for every square of that area it moves into;
    • Rocky Toughness You gain 40 temporary Hit Points when you choose this form instead of 30;
    • Melee 1 fist (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+15 bludgeoning;
    • Ranged 1 rock (range increment 40 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.jp88SCE3VCRAyE6x]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Earth)}

  • Fire Elemental 50 feet; immunity to fire; weakness to cold 10;
    • Intense Heat (aura, fire) 30 feet. A creature that enters the aura or starts its turn in the aura takes 5d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save against your spell DC. A creature can take damage from the aura only once per round;
    • Melee 1 tendril (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d10+12 fire plus 2d6 persistent fire;
    • Ranged 1 fire mote (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.lmAwCy7isFvLYdGd]{Spell Effect: Element Embodied (Fire)}

  • Water Elemental 40 feet, swim 80 feet; resistance 10 to fire;
    • Vortex (aura, water) 30 feet. Water within the aura that is part of the same body of water you occupy is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait;
    • Melee 1 wave (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d12+18 bludgeoning plus Push or Pull 10 feet;
    • Ranged 1 water spout (range increment 60 feet), Damage 4d8+6 bludgeoning.
